name: The Onanist
description:
A short first-person horror game for Windows 64-bit.

  • Explore a very gray city and the very gray desert that surrounds it
  • Talk to NPCs
  • Collect bizarre items
  • Steep yourself in the deranged ramblings of religious fanatics
  • Stare at an ominous, floating pyramid
  • Transcend your cursed flesh
